question: Mahathir Mohamad, who recently resigned, was the Prime Minister of which country?
explanation:
The 94-year old Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad recently tendered resignation from his role unexpectedly. After 2018 general election, his resignation has triggered the first major political crisis in the country.
Mahathir Mohamad has resumed work with a new title of interim prime minister, after his resignation.
